blogs.title: Climate related papers of Guy Stewart Callendar (1898-1964)
blogs.summary: Guy Stewart Callendar (1898-1964) is well-known to followers of climate science. As an introdution to his work, well worth a read is the paper “On increasing global temperatures: 75 years after Callendar” by Ed Hawkins and Phil Jones (2013). I

blogs.title: Lifting the fog of war and climate
blogs.summary: Guy Callendar’s knowledge of climate and heat let him help devise a system to clear fog from British airfields during World War Two, and do detailed measurements on gases in the air that established how important CO2 is in driving climate change.

author.name: Simple Climate
author.description: Straightforwardly explaining climate change, so you can read, react and then get on with your life.
